name: 阿琳·桑塔纳
introduction: Arlene Santana is a Mexican-American actress and host. She was born in South Texas and was raised in a small town minutes away from the US border with Mexico. Arlene graduated with a Theatre Arts degree from St. Edward's University in Austin, Texas.Her acting credits extend to film and television. Her love for sports and entertainment has helped pave her hosting career as well. She currently lives in Los Angeles, California.
